setting.name: anonymous_call_block
setting.description: Configure anonymous call block.

setting.name: autocomplete
setting.description: Configure automatic completion of numbers.

setting.name: call_hold_ringback
setting.description: Configure ringback when another party on hold.

setting.name: call_waiting
setting.description: Configure call waiting.

setting.name: callerid_blocking
setting.description: Configure caller ID blocking.

setting.name: cnf_join_enable
setting.description: Should conference bridge attempt to join the two leaf nodes when hang up.

setting.name: dnd_control
setting.description: Sets the Do Not Disturb feature.

setting.name: enable_vad
setting.description: Enable voice activation detection (VAD).

setting.name: local_cfwd_enable
setting.description: Whether the phone can do local call forwarding.

setting.name: remote_party_id
setting.description: Whether the phone sends or accepts the remote party ID.

setting.name: semi_attended_transfer
setting.description: Whether the caller can transfer the call while the call is ringing.

setting.name: stutter_msg_waiting
setting.description: Enables a stutter dial tone when there is a message waiting.

setting.name: date_format
setting.description: Format for dates.

setting.name: dst_auto_adjust
setting.description: Whether daylight savings time is automatically adjusted.

setting.name: dst_offset
setting.description: Offset from the phone time when DST is in effect.

setting.name: dst_start_day
setting.description: Day of the month on which DST begins.

setting.name: dst_start_day_of_week
setting.description: Day of the week on which DST begins.

setting.name: dst_start_month
setting.description: Month in which DST begins.

setting.name: dst_start_time
setting.description: Time of day on which DST begins.

setting.name: dst_start_week_of_month
setting.description: Week of month in which DST begins.

setting.name: dst_stop_day
setting.description: Day of the month on which DST ends.

setting.name: dst_stop_day_of_week
setting.description: Day of the week on which DST ends.

setting.name: dst_stop_month
setting.description: Month in which DST ends.

setting.name: dst_stop_time
setting.description: Time of day on which DST ends.

setting.name: dst_stop_week_of_month
setting.description: Week of month in which DST ends.

setting.name: dst_offset
setting.description: Offset from the phone time when DST is in effect.

setting.name: time_format_24hr
setting.description: Whether a 12- or 24-hour time is displayed on the LCD.

setting.name: time_zone
setting.description: Time zone in which the phone is located.

setting.name: dial_template
setting.description: Template with which you specify which file to download for a dial plan.

setting.name: directory_url
setting.description: URL of the external directory server.

setting.name: dtmf_inband
setting.description: Enable In-band DTMF signaling format.

setting.name: dtmf_outofband
setting.description: Out-of-band DTMF signaling format (none, avt, avt_always).

setting.name: logo_url
setting.description: URL of the logo file for the phone display.

setting.name: messages_uri
setting.description: Number or URI to call when messages button is pressed.

setting.name: phone_label
setting.description: Text to display on the top right status line of the LCD.

setting.name: services_url
setting.description: URL of the services BTXML files accessed when the services button is pressed.

setting.name: dyn_dns_addr_1
setting.description: IP address of a dynamic DNS server.

setting.name: dyn_dns_addr_2
setting.description: IP address of a secondary dynamic DNS server.

setting.name: dyn_tftp_addr
setting.description: IP address of a secondary, dynamic TFTP server. After initially querying sipXconfig TFTP server, the phone will rerequest the configuration files from the new TFTP server. Do not configure this value unless you intend to maintain additional TFTP server independent from sipXconfig.

setting.name: http_proxy_addr
setting.description: IP address of the HTTP proxy server.

setting.name: http_proxy_port
setting.description: Port number of the HTTP proxy server.

setting.name: nat_address
setting.description: WAN IP address of the NAT or firewall server.

setting.name: nat_enable
setting.description: Enables NAT.

setting.name: nat_received_processing
setting.description: Enables NAT received processing.

setting.name: network_media_type
setting.description: Ethernet port negotiation mode.

setting.name: network_port2_type
setting.description: Configures the device type that is connected to port 2 of the phone.

setting.name: telnet_level
setting.description: Enables Telnet for the phone.

setting.name: phone_password
setting.description: Password to be used for console or Telnet access.

setting.name: phone_prompt
setting.description: Prompt to display during Telnet or console access.

setting.name: sntp_mode
setting.description: Mode in which the phone listens for the SNTP server.

setting.name: sntp_server
setting.description: IP address of the SNTP server from which the phone obtains time data.

setting.name: call_stats
setting.description: Enable DHCP.

setting.name: start_media_port
setting.description: Start RTP range for media.

setting.name: end_media_port
setting.description: End RTP range for media.

setting.name: outbound_proxy
setting.description: IP address of the outbound proxy server.

setting.name: outbound_proxy_port
setting.description: Port number of the outbound proxy server.

setting.name: preferred_codec
setting.description: Codec to use when a call is initiated.

setting.name: proxy_backup
setting.description: IP address of the backup proxy server or gateway.

setting.name: proxy_backup_port
setting.description: Port number of the backup proxy server.

setting.name: proxy_emergency
setting.description: IP address of the emergency proxy server or gateway.

setting.name: proxy_emergency_port
setting.description: Port number of the emergency proxy server.

setting.name: proxy_register
setting.description: The phone must register with a proxy server during initialization.

setting.name: sip_invite_retx
setting.description: Maximum number of times that an INVITE request will be retransmitted.

setting.name: sip_retx
setting.description: Maximum number of times that a SIP message other than an INVITE request will be retransmitted.

setting.name: timer_invite_expires
setting.description: Amount of time, in seconds, after which a SIP INVITE expires.

setting.name: timer_registry_delta
setting.description: Configures the time interval at which reregistration will occur.

setting.name: timer_register_expires
setting.description: Amount of time, in seconds, after which a REGISTRATION request expires.

setting.name: timer_t1
setting.description: Lowest value, in ms, of the retransmission timer for SIP messages.

setting.name: timer_t2
setting.description: Highest value, in ms, of the retransmission timer for SIP messages.

setting.name: tos_media
setting.description: Type of service (ToS) levelfor the media stream being used.

setting.name: user_info
setting.description: Configures the "user=" parameter in the REGISTER message.

setting.name: voip_control_port
setting.description: UDP port user for SIP messages.

setting.name: image_version
setting.description: Firmware version that the phone should use (without filename extension).

setting.name: language
setting.description: For future use, only English is supported.

setting.name: sync
setting.description: Value against which to compare the sync value before a remote reboot is performed.

setting.name: tftp_cfg_dir
setting.description: Path to the TFTP subdirectory in which phone-specific configuration files are stored.
